last_episode_to_air.name: Jupiter
last_episode_to_air.overview: A new era is ushered in with the first test of an atomic weapon.

name: Manhattan
overview: Set against the backdrop of the greatest clandestine race against time in the history of science with the mission to build the world's first atomic bomb in Los Alamos, New Mexico. Flawed scientists and their families attempt to co-exist in a world where secrets and lies infiltrate every aspect of their lives.

episodes.name: You Always Hurt the Ones You Love
episodes.overview: A drama about the clandestine race to build the world's first atomic bomb in Los Alamos, N.M., centers on a self-destructive professor who is commissioned to help lead the Manhattan Project in the series opener.

episodes.name: The Prisoner's Dilemma
episodes.overview: Frank attempts to save his team, and pays the price; at the same time, the wives get creative trying to make life on the Hill more interesting.

episodes.name: The Hive
episodes.overview: The loss of one of their own leaves the community reeling; and new security measures interfere with the work being performed by the scientists.

episodes.name: Last Reasoning of Kings
episodes.overview: The arrival of a high-profile guest shakes things up. Frank is haunted by his past.

episodes.name: A New Approach to Nuclear Cosmology
episodes.overview: Frank clashes with Charlie to protect Babbit, who has become the subject of an investigation.

episodes.name: Acceptable Limits
episodes.overview: Frank seeks medical answers; Charlie and Helen travel to survey an off-site reactor.

episodes.name: The New World
episodes.overview: Helen and Charlie deal with a crisis; Abby embarks on a journey of self-discovery.

episodes.name: The Second Coming
episodes.overview: Both Charlie and Frank face serious questions as to the future of their projects.

episodes.name: Spooky Action at a Distance
episodes.overview: Frank and Charlie hatch a plan.

episodes.name: The Understudy
episodes.overview: An unexpected visitor arrives on the Hill.

episodes.name: Tangier
episodes.overview: A development overseas re-invigorates the hunt for a spy on The Hill. Charlie and Abby make a sacrifice when the plan with Frank is threatened.

episodes.name: The Gun Model
episodes.overview: Akley becomes vulnerable when he tries to fix Thin Man's shortcomings.

episodes.name: Perestroika
episodes.overview: Frank is offered a life-changing opportunity. At the same time, the U.S. Army put Charlie on the hot seat.

episodes.name: Damnatio Memoriae
episodes.overview: Charlie is forced into a new leadership role in the race to build the worlds first atomic bomb.

episodes.name: Fatherland
episodes.overview: Frank discovers the real reason he's been taken captive.

episodes.name: The Threshold
episodes.overview: Liza faces off against Darrow as Abby learns a secret about Oppenheimer.

episodes.name: Overlord
episodes.overview: Oppenheimer puts Charlie in a precarious position.

episodes.name: The World of Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Frank attempts to navigate his new place on the Hill.
The scientists and the Army battle for control of the bomb.

episodes.name: Behold The Lord High Executioner
episodes.overview: The hunt for a Soviet spy turns deadly.

episodes.name: Human Error
episodes.overview: As the project falters, Charlie turns to an unlikely partner for help.

episodes.name: Brooklyn
episodes.overview: Days before the world's first nuclear explosion, everyone races to secure their place in history.

episodes.name: Jupiter
episodes.overview: A new era is ushered in with the first test of an atomic weapon.
